description:
Create an end-to-end PACS solution with Service Class Providers (SCP) that store and retrieve DICOM data sets and process DIMSE Services, including C-STORE, C-GET, C-MOVE, C-FIND, C-ECHO, N-EVENT-REPORT, N-ACTION, and others. Patient Updating is also supported via the N-ACTION DIMSE Service. Also included is integrated data access layer (DAL) support to easily store/retrieve the data required by an SCP.

This is just a small part of a large technology offering called LEADTOOLS, which offers complete DICOM data set, directory (DICOMDIR), secure communication, medical-related image processing, 2D and 3D viewers, and video playback technology. LEADTOOLS Medical toolkits are indispensable if you are working on applications for medical and other life sciences industries. To see all that LEADTOOLS has to offer, go to https://www.leadtools.com


Example Projects:
• All - https://bitly.im/leadtools_all
• Medical High-Level PACS - https://bitly.im/leadtools_medical
